DOC.brief_title: ALK29-002 : A Study Baclofen Formulations Healthy Adults
DOC.criteria: Between age 18 65 year Body mass index 19 30 kg/m2 screen If subject female childbearing potential , must agree use acceptable method contraception duration study Pregnancy and/or currently breastfeed Clinical significant medical condition observe abnormality Acute gastrointestinal disorder history chronic gastrointestinal disease surgery Participation clinical trial within 30 day screen Known intolerance and/or hypersensitivity baclofen excipients Use alcohol , caffeine , xanthinecontaining product Clinically significant illness within 30 day first study drug administration Dietary restriction conflict require study meal
